text: The 2015 South Tyneside Metropolitan Borough Council election was held 7 May 2015 to elect members of South Tyneside Metropolitan Borough Council in England. This was on the same day as other local elections. ==Results by electoral ward== ===Beacon & Bents ward=== ===Bede ward=== ===Biddick & All Saints ward=== ===Boldon Colliery ward=== ===Cleadon & East Boldon ward=== ===Cleadon Park ward=== ===Fellgate & Hedworth ward=== ===Harton ward=== ===Hebburn North ward=== ===Hebburn South ward=== ===Horsley Hill ward=== ===Monkton ward=== ===Primrose ward=== ===Simonside & Rekendyke ward=== ===West Park ward=== ===Westoe ward=== ===Whitburn & Marsden ward=== ===Whiteleas ward=== ==References== Category:2015 English local elections Category:May 2015 events in the United Kingdom 2015 Category:21st century in Tyne and Wear
title: 2015 South Tyneside Metropolitan Borough Council election
